Blog.post: today is day 2 of my mystical adventure.... and several new names have been added to the list of people I'm gonna bomb b4 i die... n e who.. since I'm busy with my sk8er/guitarist/stupid loser/prettyboy lifestyle, I'm gonna go look at myself... naked.. :d have fun with that picture in your head.. losers!! bye! :D
gah... well. here you go... read to your hearts content... pssst... im a loooser ;) .
Well, If ur all gona read this, tell me about any upcoming, or newly released albums. I can check em out , and rant about em ;) !! yay me.

I figure... if I'm gonna have a blog, that I should porbably write in it every once in a while, so what better to write about than the things I hate so very much :D! There's this whole ... hmm ... "Panzy music" scene in teh North america... or that's what I like to call it. Not that I have anything against a change in music, and in people, and in the way people think...I just fucking hate it. Lets get very specific. One particular piece, EMO, sends chills down my spine. Emo - ISSSSS... music that thinks its special in its own way in stating that it does infact deal with... yes... emotion... I don't know about you, but when I think of music, or art in general, I think of expression... and generally one wouldn't waste their time expressing something they don't feel. Kinda makes you think just how "special" they really wanna be. Which brings us to this. EVERY FUCKING GENRE IS EMO!!! in a sense that, beleive it or not, all music is emotional. I personally find that those who claim to be "emo" do infact listen to and write an entirely different genre of music. To me the whole thing is a bunch of whiney men writing about breakups and having their hearts broken, and blah blah. A good sad song doesn't hurt, but to base a career on some "valentines day special" bullshit seems to me to be a waste of time. I'd get sick... personally. But then again, you can all think for yourselves ;) . I'm hoping for more groups like the smashing pumpkins, cuz they! ... were cool :P. heheh this has been my 10 minutes worth... -- I posted this on my other blog b4, but i guess it makes more sense to put it here :\ .
The new blog i made... all about the music -- I'm gonna start reveiwing new shit, post when I can... ;)

WEEEELL!! who teh fock didn't see this comming... I'm as of about 2 weeks ago, absolutely slipknot crazy. Maybe cuz I'm such a fucked up violent adolescent... They describe -In gruesome detail - EXACTLY how i feel towards people ... If your into the whole slipknot kinda style check out this song -- get this -- its funneh!!! heheheh nevertheless I don't have the patience to type a whole lot about them... but I'll review them at a ater date... for now.... go fuck yourself ;) .
